r.d: MDB is a merge of PEAR DB's and Metabases that provides a unified DB API. It also provides methods for DB portability and DB feature emulation. Most notably it features a DB independent XML-Schema manager.
r.n: fixed a serious bug in parser.php that prevented tables from being initialized correctly; added several new methods to better match the PEAR DB feature set; added PHPDoc comments to most methods in common.php; more formating improvements
